name: play-media-serialization
description: Serialization of Content Hub ONE content types and content items for the PLAY! Media project

scripts.pull:types: cd items && ch-one-cli ser pull content-type
scripts.push:types: cd items && ch-one-cli ser push content-type
scripts.push:content-block-type: cd items && ch-one-cli ser push content-type -i ContentBlock
scripts.push:location-type: cd items && ch-one-cli ser push content-type -i Location
scripts.pull:items: cd items && ch-one-cli ser pull content-item -c Sport && ch-one-cli ser pull content-item -c Athlete && ch-one-cli ser pull content-item -c Event && cd .. && ts-node scripts/removeMediaFromContentItems.ts
scripts.push:items: cd items && ch-one-cli ser push content-item -c Sport && ch-one-cli ser push content-item -c Athlete && ch-one-cli ser push content-item -c Event
scripts.push:content-block-items: cd items && ch-one-cli ser push content-item -c ContentBlock
scripts.push:location-items: cd items && ch-one-cli ser push content-item -c Location
scripts.publish:item: cd items && ch-one-cli delivery content publish

author: Sitecore Demo Solutions team
